name: Yellow's Hangman game
description:
Yellow's Hangman game

made by someone with 10+ hours of python experience!!! wow!!!

obviously an action game y'know

IMPORTANT: windows defender will block the .exe as I have not signed the .exe.

to unblock it, go to file explorer, right click on the file, select properties>unblock>apply.
